title: Looking for subs for tournament tomorrow (Saturday) Gold/Plat
body:
Hey guys, some friends and myself will be entering the Total Mayhem Gaming Bronze-Platinum tournament starting tomorrow at 1pm. We currently have 5 players, but at least one of our players won't be able to stay for the whole tournament if we make it that far. As such we're looking for a few people who would be available anytime between 1pm and 7pm tomorrow to play with us in case we need you. 

Feel free to add me on league, or discord at Sketchyy #5306

replies.body: I was gold now silver check my stats on op.gg main support
